content:
Your task is to create a concise running summary of actions and information results in the provided text, focusing on key and potentially important information to remember.

You will receive the current summary and the your latest actions. Combine them, adding relevant key information from the latest development in 1st person past tense and keeping the summary concise.

Summary So Far:
"""
{'role': 'system', 'content': "This reminds you of these events from your past: \nAs per my latest action, I used the 'get_text_summary' command to retrieve a summary of the Subway Surfers game from its Wikipedia page. The command was successful and returned the summary."}
"""

Latest Development:
"""
[{'role': 'your computer', 'content': 'Command get_text_summary returned:  "Result" : Subway Surfers is an endless runner mobile game developed by Kiloo and SYBO Games. In the game, players take the role of young graffiti artists who run through the railroad tracks to escape from the inspector and his dog after being caught in the act of "tagging" a metro railway site. The game has received mixed to positive reviews for its visual style and entertaining gameplay but criticized for its monotonous world and unresponsive controls. It has been downloaded over 2.7 billion times and was the most downloaded mobile game of the decade from 2012 to 2019. The game has also been adapted into an animated series.'}, {'role': 'you', 'content': '{"command": {"name": "browse_website", "args": {"url": "https://subwaysurfers.com/", "question": "What new updates or events are happening in Subway Surfers?"}}}'}]
"""
